    public class ProcessorManagementOutboundPort
extends fr.upmc.components.ports.AbstractOutboundPort
implements ProcessorManagementI
    The class ProcessorManagementOutboundPort defines an outbound port associated with the interface ProcessorManagementI.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void setCoreFrequency(int coreNo, int frequency)
      set a new frequency for a given core on this processor; exceptions are raised if the required frequency is not admissible for this processor or not currently possible for the given core.

      • setCoreFrequency

        public void setCoreFrequency(int coreNo,
                    int frequency)
                      throws UnavailableFrequencyException,
                             UnacceptableFrequencyException,
                             java.lang.Exception
        Description copied from interface: ProcessorManagementI
        set a new frequency for a given core on this processor; exceptions are raised if the required frequency is not admissible for this processor or not currently possible for the given core.

        Contract

         pre    this.isValidCoreNo(coreNo)
 post   true                    // no postcondition.
        Specified by:
        setCoreFrequency in interface ProcessorManagementI
        Parameters:
        coreNo - number of the core to be modified.
        frequency - new frequency for the given core.
        Throws:
        UnavailableFrequencyException
        UnacceptableFrequencyException
        java.lang.Exception
